actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to correct the tariff treatment of certain nickel catalysts.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide a duty on certain nickel compounds containing nickel powder, or nickel compound powder, suspended or encapsulated in vegetable oil or tallow.

titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to correct the tariff treatment of certain nickel catalysts.
